imdb.title: Hiiro no Kakera
imdb.plot: Believing she is to live with her grandmother because her parents are transferred abroad, Tamaki Kasuga travels to the town of Kifumura. There, she is told that she is actually to perform the role of sealing the sword Onikirimaru ...

episodes.title: Tamayori's Fate
episodes.plot: Daily peaceful is back, Tamaki to reflect on the past. However, unrest in the aura was imminent ....

episodes.title: Ominous Dark Clouds
episodes.plot: A traitor is in the midst of the princess protection group.

episodes.title: The Traitor's Vow
episodes.plot: Dealing with Suguru's allegiance with Logos was enough of a problem, but learning that Shinji is also a traitor may be too much to handle.

episodes.title: The Destruction of the Five Houses
episodes.plot: The gods are become more impatient, and Tamaki may be too weak to control the events heading their way.

episodes.title: The Truth Behind the Tears
episodes.plot: With one guardian exiled and another that can't be trusted, Tamakai's trusted circle is crumbling while Logos becomes more powerful.

episodes.title: The Deceitful Heart
episodes.plot: Takuma has returned for Tamaki but a powerful border protects her. The other guardians are surprised by her confinement and Baba's treatment of the group.

episodes.title: Memory of a Dream
episodes.plot: Between Logos and the Guardians many secrets are being revealed and the history of the Onikirimaru and Princess is revealed.

episodes.title: The Resolution
episodes.plot: Takuma and Tamaki are making a break for it, but Baba seems to have planned for everything. As they run in circles, they are chased by gods, guardians, and the past.

episodes.title: The Eternal Promise
episodes.plot: Still on the run, Tamaki runs into Ryo and Kiyono.

episodes.title: The Power of the Gods
episodes.plot: The Guardians are on the offensive against Drei and Zwei, while Takuma has to battle the demon inside and Ein.

episodes.title: Scarlet Fragments
episodes.plot: Takuma and Tamaki both intend to sacrifice themselves for the other, and Aria confronts Drei about his true identity.

episodes.title: The Guardian's Awakening
episodes.plot: The birth of the true Tamayori Princess is upon us!

episodes.title: The Eternal Pledge
episodes.plot: The Guardians and Tamaki finally face off against Drei, and before it's all over, one person will make the ultimate sacrifice.

episodes.title: The Tamayori's Fate
episodes.plot: Tamaki remembers the adventures she once had with her friends, but there is still so much more to come.

episodes.title: A Step of Determination
episodes.plot: In order to protect Onikirimaru, Tamaki succeeds her grandmother as the Tamayori Princess. Puzzled by her new-found persona, yet skillfully guarded by a group of protectors, Tamaki begins to unravel the mysteries behind her new identity.

episodes.title: The Five Guardians
episodes.plot: After being rescued from a near death plunge, Tamaki meets Shinji, the fifth member of the Shugogo House. Though the reunion is joyful, Tamaki senses that the others are not too fond of him. Tamaki worries.

episodes.title: Advent of the Saint
episodes.plot: The mysterious group "Logos" lets its presence be known while Tamaki and the others head to the secret location where the sacred items are sealed. Tamaki and her guardians must stop them from breaking the seals.

episodes.title: The Two Tasks
episodes.plot: Tamaki and her guardians fail to defend the first seal, and it falls victim to Logos and their leader, Aria. As the situation worsens, Shizuki urges Tamaki to release the Tamayori princess within her.

episodes.title: The Course of the Battle
episodes.plot: The promised battle has begun: the Logos have bypassed the seal and prepare to engage Tamaki and Takuma Mahiro of Shugogo house.

episodes.title: The Breaking of Bonds
episodes.plot: The bonds between Tamaki and the Shugogo house guardians begins to break. As Tamaki offers her consolation, the guardians rebuff her and demand answers.

episodes.title: The Prediction of the Bureau of Medicine
episodes.plot: A new face appears, claiming to be from the country's court Physician's bureau. Suguru and the Shugogo are unsure of this mystery man as he offers his help, unable to read his intentions and doubting his story. Tamaki takes a gamble and accepts the offer.

episodes.title: The Rumbling of the Earth
episodes.plot: The gods sealed within the woods begin to awaken. Due to the weakening of the Onikirimaru seal, the gods begin transforming one after the other. Takuma an the others try to suppress the wrath of the gods.

episodes.title: The Guardian's Feelings
episodes.plot: The Onikirimaru seals fall one by one to the Logos' influence. In order to strengthen the Tamayori Princess' Guardians, both the Shugogo and Ugaya houses agree to live under the same roof.

episodes.title: The Demon's Tradition
episodes.plot: Even through bad situations, Tamaki finds the good in everyone living together, and befriends them all. As a power deep within her stirs, Tamaki realizes the time of awakening for the Tamayori Princess draws closer.

episodes.title: A Time for Battle
episodes.plot: Tamaki and her guardians realize the true meaning of living together with the Ugaya. The Logos are hunting for the last remaining seals, an the Shugogo house must split in two in order to stop them.

episodes.title: The Power of Onikirimaru
episodes.plot: With the last seal broken, the Onikirimaru awakens, emitting raw power and causing the demon within Takuma to emerge. Meanwhile, the rest of Shugogo house face off against the Logos in the thrilling conclusion of Hiiro no Kakera!
